town.wintext: You win when all the bad guys are gone.

town-ally.wintext: You win if the town wins.

mafia.wintext: You win when you have majority and there are no other killers.

mafia-ally.wintext: You win if the Mafia wins.

wolf.wintext: You win when you have majority and there are no other killers.

survivor.wintext: You win if you are alive at the end of the game.

sk.wintext: You win when you are in the final two and there are no other killers.

cult.wintext: You win when you have majority and there are no other killers.

lyncher.wintext: You win if your target is lynched.

jester.wintext: You win if you are lynched.
